org.hibernate.testing.tm
Class SimpleJtaTransactionManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.testing.tm.SimpleJtaTransactionManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionManager
public class SimpleJtaTransactionManagerImpl
extends Object
implements TransactionManager

TransactionManager implementation specifically designed for use in test suite and simple usage scenarios. For example, it assumes that there is only ever a single transaction active at a given time.

Author:
Gavin King, Steve Ebersole
